TopicTitle: Not able to see Mun Intercept when plotting manoeuvre 1.4.2

Articles.Content:
I have Jeb and Val in Orbit, about to plot a manoeuvre, as I usually did in 1.3.1 but when I plot it (in the right space, mind you) the 'Mun Intercept' doesn't appear. Is there a setting that has changed in 1.4 (I have had this bug in all 1.4 versions - 1.4, 1.4.1, and 1.4.2)?

Help would be appreciated,

RocketSimplicity
